    • Method Detail

      • addRoads

        public void addRoads(City a,
                     City b,
                     int length)
        Adds roads starting in the given two cities, if and only if they lie within this Country and ending in the other City. With distance length.
        Parameters:
        City - a The first City.
        City - b The second City.
        int - length The potential distance between them.

      • bonus

        public int bonus(int value)
        Calculates a random integer based upon the Random implemented in the Game Class.
        Parameters:
        value - The value used in calculations.
        Returns:
        A random value based upon the value paramater and the implementation of random in the Game class.

      • getCities

        public java.util.List<City> getCities()
        Returns the list of cities within the country.
        Returns:
        List of cities.

      • getCity

        public City getCity(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a City with the given name, or null if no such city exists within the Country.
        Parameters:
        name - Name we wish to search for.
        Returns:
        City by name name.

      • getGame

        public Game getGame()
        Returns a reference to the Game that we are playing.
        Returns:
        a pointer to the Game this country is a part of.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the country.
        Returns:
        The countrys name.

      • getNetwork

        public java.util.Map<City,java.util.List<Road>> getNetwork()
        Returns the infrastructure network of the Country, a Map that maps a City to a List of Road objects.
        Returns:
        The network field variable.

      • getRoads

        public java.util.List<Road> getRoads(City c)
        Returns the list of Roads starting in the given City, if and only if the City lies within the borders of the Country.
        Parameters:
        c - The City whos list of Roads we wish to get.
        Returns:
        The list of roads starting in City c.

      • position

        public Position position(City city)
        This method creates a Position object with the paramaters city, city and 0. To represent the position of the city.
        Parameters:
        city - The City we wish to create a position.
        Returns:
        The position of the city.

      • readyToTravel

        public Position readyToTravel(City from,
                              City to)
        We wish to check if there is a road from the City from, to the City to, and if there is we return a Position object representing our readiness to travel. If we get a Position(from,to,length) object we have begun the journey from from to to, and have taken 0 steps. If we get a Position(from,from,0) object we cannot travel from from to to.
        Parameters:
        from - The City we wish to travel from
        to - The City we wish to travel to
        Returns:
        The position object that represents our new position

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets all cities within the Country.

      • setGame

        public void setGame(Game game)
        Sets the game this country is a part of.
        Parameters:
        game - The game we wish this country to partake in.
